home.title2: from different parts of the world
home.description: Here you can find tea from all over the world, the most unimaginable flavors and aromas

about.quality_fresh_tea_text: We brew and taste tea over and over again until we find the perfect taste, so our catalog contains the best varieties from the most famous plantations in the world.
about.gift_baskets_text: We will put together in a beautiful package a personalized gift set for your loved ones so that they can appreciate your care and all the taste of our tea.
about.exclusive_tea_mixes_text: Try our mixes based on culinary trends, mixology and inspiration
about.tea_accessories_text: Here you will find all the necessary utensils for the proper storage, brewing and serving of tea.
about.rich_beneficial_elements: Tea is rich in beneficial trace elements
about.invigorates_the_spirit: Tea invigorates the spirit, increases brain activity, improves memory
about.normalizes_activity_of_heart: Tea normalizes the activity of the heart, blood vessels, digestive system
about.tea_relieves_fatigue: Tea relieves fatigue and stimulates metabolism
about.tea_inhibits_malignant_tumors: Tea inhibits the growth of malignant tumors, and significantly reduces the risk of cell transformation into cancer
about.collect_paragraph_1: We collect tea leaves as many times a year as the number of times the tea vegetates - that is, it gives new shoots with leaves. In Indonesia, Sri Lanka, Kenya, in the south of India and China, where it's always summer - all year round.
about.collect_paragraph_2: The further north the plantations are located, the shorter the tea harvest season - in northeastern India it lasts eight months, in northern China tea leaves are harvested no more than four times a year, from April to September.
about.collect_paragraph_3: We collect tea by hand, cutting off not all the leaves, but only a few of the youngest and juiciest leaves with a part of the stem on which they are attached, and the so-called bud (or tips) - an unblown leaf at the tip of the shoot. Everything so that you drink only the most delicious and fresh tea!

picking.assembly_process_of_tea: Procesul de asamblare a ceaiului nostru
